description: Support to the Operationalization of the African Peer Review Mechanism in Mozambique

subproject.corporate outcome: Civil society, including civil society organizations and voluntary associations, and the private sector contribute to the MDGs in support of national planning strategies and policies
subproject.description:
The African Peer Review Mechanism is a new mechanism aimed to improve Democratic Governance. Mozambican institutions (Government and CSO) need to be capacitated to operationalize this new methodology. To achive this objective the project will achieve the following outputs: 
a) Country Review Report and Programme of action, adopted
b) Public awareness on APRM integrated in Government 
c) APRM Technical Unit integrated in Government
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: African Peer Review Mechanism
